title: Collaborative and Blended Learning-Based Program for Strengthening Social Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and foundational knowledge of social studies subjects
context.additional_context: Non-degree social competency development program for corporate employees, offering a blended learning environment combining offline classes and digital tools

learning_goals: Through collaborative activities with peers, learners can improve their ability to solve social problems by 80% or more.
In a blended learning environment, learners can effectively organize learning content by utilizing digital tools with over 70% efficiency.
Through formative assessments, learners can identify three or more issues arising during collaborative learning and propose improvement strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
